column1: Cafe Ba-Ba-Reeba!////I love Cafe Ba-Ba-Reeba.  I've been to other tapas restaurants
column2: many of which were described by friends as 'the best
column3: ' but this one still remains my favorite.  It has a very extensive menu of tapas and everything is generally well executed.  Because of this
column4: I swear I've ended up here more than any other restaurant in Chicago (tapas or otherwise) because people always want to go.
